#summary &gg; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesG

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gg;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Gg;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22d9/index.htm U+022D9].
  * `&gg;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/226b/index.htm U+0226B].
